question:
Which among the following statements is/are correct about oceanic climates?
  1. It typically lacks a dry season, as precipitation is more evenly dispersed throughout the year.
  2. Oceanic climates can have considerable storm activity as they are located in the belt of the stormy westerlies.
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation: An oceanic climate, also known as a marine climate or temperate oceanic climate, is the KÃ¶ppen classification of climate typical of west coasts in higher middle latitudes of continents. It typically lacks a dry season, as precipitation is more evenly dispersed throughout the year. Oceanic climates can have considerable storm activity as they are located in the belt of the stormy westerlies.
